channel.title: Less than 0.13hz LFO
channel.description:
Dear all,
is there any way or trick to set the minimum rate of an LFO below 0.13Hz? I would use it for very slow modulation so I'd need something like 0.001. Thank you

item.title: Less than 0.13hz LFO
item.dc:creator: @anon5189335
item.description:
@anon5189335 wrote:

Have you tried connecting a dial/b to the pitch inlet of the lfo? If you do that, setting the dial/b to MINUS 12 will make the lfo speed half of what is set on the lfo itself. So if the lfo speed is 0.13hz it will be 0,065 hz. Setting it to -24 = 0,0325 hz... and so on.... I think that could work too.

Or else I'd suggest the lin lfo too.

Read full topic

item.title: Less than 0.13hz LFO
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

I think use one of the lin variants which use freq, which starts from zero.

Read full topic
